message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to counterpropose a price of $13,000 for the product.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $13,700?
I understand your position, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $13,500 for the product.
